column3: We meet currently a problem to update shipping charges for Librairie category using SubmitOfferPackage by API. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
We meet currently a problem to update orders by API using ValidateOrderList. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
We meet currently a problem to update and get orders using ValidateOrderList and GetOrderList by API. Our teams are mobilized to resolved this issue.
We meet currently a problem to update offers in StockAndPrice mode by API using SubmitOfferPackage. This issue will be resolved W46.
We meet currently a problem to get products information using our API method GetProductListByIdentifier from S29. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
